benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/tags - Add tags to invoice item

covered: Valid Payload: TC01-TC03 verify successful creation with one or more tag definitions.
State handling: TC04 and TC05 verify behavior when invoice item already has tags vs. has none.

Validation/Error Handling: TC06 (missing header), TC07 (invalid invoice item id format), TC09 (malformed JSON), TC10 (empty payload), TC11 (invalid tag definition UUID), TC12 (unsupported parameters), TC24 (null/empty entries).
Not Found/Authorization: TC08 (non-existent item - 404) and TC16 (unauthorized - 401).
Resilience/Dependencies: TC14 (heavy load), TC17 (KillBill service down), TC21 (tag definition service down), TC25 (timeout).
Security/Robustness: TC18 (malicious payload), TC19 (extremely large payload), TC23 (maximum tags), TC22 (state variation), TC20 (regression on existing tag).
Duplication handling: TC13 (duplicate tag definitions in request) and TC20 (regression case).
gaps: Rate limiting not covered: no 429 tests.
500 Internal Server Error scenario not explicitly tested (only 503/504).
Concurrency tests beyond simple duplicates are not present.
Observability/audit logs or metrics on tag creation are not tested.
End-to-end verification via GET after POST is not included.
recommendations: Add rate-limiting tests to verify 429 responses and throttling behavior.
Add 403 Forbidden test to cover authenticated users without required permissions.
Add explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario to test server-side failures.
Introduce concurrency tests to simulate multiple clients posting tags simultaneously to detect race conditions.
Add observability tests for audit/logging/metrics on tag creation, if available.
Add end-to-end tests that retrieve tags after POST to verify persisted state and idempotency checks for duplicates.
